title: JEPLUSPENNY Baby Blue Textured Flameless Candles Led Candle Gift Set of 3 Pillar Candles, Candlescape Led Tea Light Set with Decorative Pebble Rocks and Wood Tray, 10-Key Remote Timer, Gift for Home
features: 【SIZE & PACKAGE】This Baby blue Flameless Led Candle Candlescape Gift Set includes 3 real wax Led pillar candles(one H 6" x D 3", H 5" x D 3", H 4" x D 3") , a 10-key remote controls and Decorative Natural Pebbles Rocks and Wooden Tray. PLEASE NOTE that Each candle requires 2 AA batteries (NOT Included).

【Elegant Candlescape Set】The Wood Tray LED Led Tea Light Candle Candlescape has a very Classic and Elegant look, it provides realistic flickering effect, brings the most realistic experience to any room. It is ideal for decorations for Home, Bars, Hotels. It can be widely applied in Special Occasions such Wedding, Party, Reiki, Spa, Aromatherapy.

【BEAUTIFUL & REALISTIC LOOK】We use real wax and realistic flickering flame design to make the Led Candle Lights just like the real candles! Incredibly realistic dancing flame LED Candle makes the candles sway and flicker so convincingly. Besides, these amazing Led flameless candle lights have a genuine wax pillar body and Long-Lasting LEDs that give off warm, natural light.

【REMOTE CONTROL & Cycling Timer】Move the OFF-ON switch on the bottom to ON and then You could control all our candles with the 10-key remote control. You Could Choose among 2/4/6/8 Hours Timers, and the Timer Will Cycle Every 24 Hours. Just set the timer function and enjoy your evening - you don't have to worry about switching them off later! With the Smart Control, you could also choose modes Between Flickering/non-Flickering and lower or increase Brightness Levels.

【SAFT & Long-Lasting】Lighting candles in Your home can be dangerous, But the LED Candle are 100% Safe and Flameless. These candles are smoke-free, no fire hazards, no burning risks or messy dripping wax. They are perfect for places like bookshelves and bedrooms, Safe for families with pets or little children. It is the best replacement of traditional burning Candles. Besides, these Led candles are made to last-Buy them once, have them forever! It is Cost Saving and environmental Friendly.
description: Package Included
- 1 x LED Candles (H 4" x D 3") - 1 x LED Candles (H 5" x D 3") - 1 x LED Candles (H 6" x D 3")
- 1 x Black Wood Candle Tray Holder with Rocks
- 1 x Remote Control (battery included in the Remote) - 1 x User Manual
Battery Operated
This flameless candle is operated by 2 x AA batteries (Not included)
Safe To Use Around Children and Pets
These Led candles are without real fire. Never worry about fire-related accidents again.
SMOKELESS AND DRIPLESS CANDLES
These Battery-operated Candles are smoke-free, no fire hazards, no burning risks or messy dripping wax. Ideal for bookshelves, bedrooms and safe focal points in holiday wreaths and centerpieces.
Real Flame-effect Candles

These dancing candles are so realistic that practically indistinguishable from traditional burning candles. Flame simulation technology makes the candles flicker, brings the most realistic experience to any room.
Real Wax & Elegant Design
The candle shell is made of real wax. Smooth finish, classic ivory color and elegant design.
How to Use the Candle
Move the OFF-ON switch on the bottom to ON. The candle will illuminate until you manually move the switch to OFF.
ON-OFF button:
Illuminating the Candle On=Off (Note:Before you use the Remote Control, switch the ON-OFF button to ON at the bottom of the LED candles).
TIMER:
Set On/Off Automatic Time feature, set to 2/4/6/8Hours.
Mode:
Candle-Flickering Lights; Light-Non-Flickering Lights.
Brightness Control:
Left button to lower the brightness, Right button to increase brightness.
More Tips:

1. Keep out of direct sunlight, away from heat sources and out of extreme temperatures or your candle may soften or melt.2. Keep out of Water, Steam and moisture.3.Please remove the batteries if not to use for a long time.
